package.name: ReachToLockX
package.shortDescription: Replaces the reachability gesture to lock the device instead.

descriptionlist.description: Only tested on iOS 13, feel free to try it on other iOS versions and please report back the results to me on Twitter @itsnicho1as.
Made for iPhones without a home button, should work on other devices as well but it's not made for those.
Option to still open reachability by swiping down one time and locking the device with two reachability swipes.
Option to change the delay time that is required between multiple swipes.
